description: From cultural fashion shows to protests; what does it mean to be a student activist in the new millennium? Are Penn students apathetic or has the definition of activism shifted over time? Through this course, students will unpack many of the controversies regarding the discourse on "multiculturalism" and "diversity". In examining these phenomena, we will concentrate particularly on student experiences, curricula, campus climates, and administrative practices. Please see our website for more current information: asam.sas.upenn.edu
name: ASIAN AMERICAN ACTIVISM
